name: javascript-html-css-responsive-form-input-search-google-ido-paz
description:
1. Use exiting index.html,style.css files without changing them
2. All javascript form validation code should be written in external file named formValidtion.js.
3. Form submiting valitiation rules:
a. The q input must have at least 1 character(not whitespace) and the text must be a string and not a number.
b. The num input must have at least 1 character and must be a number between 1 to 25.
4. When pressing submit:
a. Display alert when one of the (b OR c) rules are not met,and don't submit the data.
b. Submit form data to google when the (b OR c) rules are met.
